metadata.name: IN MY DREAMS
metadata.description: Surrealist surfunkadelia about the inescapable subconscious surrounding a heartbreak. Written, arranged, produced, and mixed by me, GUSPY.  Originally composed by Ellis Geis. Artwork designed by me. The fifth single leading up to my debut project, SQUIGGLY & GIGGLY, and set to be released on streaming platforms January 1st, 2023.

project.title: SQUIGGLY & GIGGLY
project.description: GUSPY's debut project showcasing his one-of-a-kind surfunkadelic soundscape. Produced during his college years from the ages 19 to 22. All instruments performed by GUSPY, except for one funk guitar riff on the outro of NICE OUT, which was performed by Noah Ehler. All songs written entirely by GUSPY, except for the chords and lead guitar melody on IN MY DREAMS, which were written by Ellis Geis. All songs produced by GUSPY, and STEEZ LU√çZ, NICE OUT, and THE 55 are co-produced, mixed, and mastered by Jason Ren aka JVSE. ROBITUSSIN LAZY was vocal produced, mixed, and mastered by Johnny May Clark III. COOL CUCUMBER was mastered by Conor Carroll.

lyrics.text:
In my dreams
you fuck with me
you made my head
my enemy
why can't you leave me
all alone
I wish you didn't
use a phone
to say
I woke up with no love for you today
goodbye
hung up and never saw the tears that I cry

I wish I could say
that I have changed
no way
you and I both know
I'm still the same
I'm still lost
and I'm still sauced
from last night
you held me so damn tight

I said
in my dreams
you fuck with me
you made my head
my enemy
why can't you leave me
all alone
I wish you didn't
use a phone
to say
I woke up with no love for you today
goodbye
hung up and never saw the tears that I cry

well, bitch
I've got quite
a lot to say
but my mouth is full
of clouds and waves
please feed my tongue
and light my fire
young love, such truth
but you're such a fucking liar
you really didn't give a fuck
so Imma go stupid
let's get drunk
Imma get high
until I die
blow a fat hole
through a sun-kissed sky
Imma tour the world
and meet some pretty girls
and pound cheap beer
until I hurl
or at least until
I wake up

until then,
Imma just
fuck it up
